item.title: By: Dave
item.dc:creator: Dave
item.description:
People are always going to abuse other peoples hearts for charity, that's just human nature from the very beginning of time. This one has a ring of truth to it though and I'm inclined to believe it.
<a href="http://ambernight.org/archives/2006/07/18/282" rel="nofollow">Amber has a little different take.</a>
item.content:encoded:
People are always going to abuse other peoples hearts for charity, that’s just human nature from the very beginning of time. This one has a ring of truth to it though and I’m inclined to believe it.

Amber has a little different take.
